It's #MentalHealthAwarenessMonth, and working in any creative field can feel overwhelming. 

Here's your reminder to take it slow, if you need to. Art should be fun, and it shouldn't be the thing that you end up resenting.

@JCPxDESIGNS Hi there— thank you for this. Threadless artists are able to donate proceeds from their designs to @ACLU via Threadless Causes, but we’re looking at expanding into more options as well.
@jakeduhjake Hi there! Sorry for the delayed response, but it looks like our help team took care of the shipping address change. Please let us know if we can help with anything else!
